precondition: compact_drive IN failed STATE AND clinical_ui IN is_running STATE
behaviour: THE clinical_ui SHALL SWITCH THE compact_drive TO is_running

precondition: compact_drive IN failed AND clinical_ui IN is_running
behaviour: THE clinical_ui SHALL SWITCH THE compact_drive TO is_running
THE clinical_ui SHALL SWITCH THE compact_drive TO is_running

precondition: compact_drive IN failed STATE AND clinical_ui IN is_running STATE
behaviour: THE clinical_ui SHALL SWITCH TO is_running

precondition: compact_drive IN failed STATE AND clinical_ui IN is_running STATE
behaviour: THE clinical_ui SHALL SWITCH AND ALLOW THE compact_drive TO is_running

precondition: compact_drive IN failed STATE AND clinical_ui IN is_running STATE
behaviour: THE is_running SHALL SWITCH THE is_running TO is_running
THE clinical_ui SHALL SWITCH A compact_drive TO is_running
THE clinical_ui SHALL SWITCH ANY compact_drive TO is_running
THE clinical_ui SHALL SWITCH THE systolic_pressure TO is_running
THE clinical_ui SHALL NOT SWITCH THE compact_drive TO is_running

precondition: failed IN failed AND clinical_ui IN is_running STATE
behaviour: THE is_running SHALL SWITCH A compact_drive
THE clinical_ui SHALL NOT SWITCH THE clinical_ui TO is_running
